definition[0]: the child of your uncle or aunt
definition[1]: something that has the same origins as something else
example[0]: The Alaskan brown bear is a close cousin of the grizzly bear.
example[1]: a drug that is a chemical cousin to amphetamines
definition[2]: someone or something that is similar to someone or something else
example[2]: His avant-garde music, sometime cousin to jazz, had limited appeal.
